key.name: isolate-workspaces
key.description: When active, running applications are only shown on the dash/panel in their workspace

key.name: show-panel-indicator
key.description: When active, a management indicator is shown on the panel.

key.name: show-workspace-overlay
key.description: When active, labels of the active custom workspaces are shown .

key.name: show-notifications
key.description: When active, a desktop notification is shown indicating when a custom workspace has been switched to.

key.name: favorites-prototype
key.summary: Object represting the current favorite apps on the panel
key.description: Contains the naming and app data for each favorite.

key.name: workset-prototype-json
key.summary: JSObject containing info on each custom workspace
key.description: Contains the information on each custom workspace.

key.name: workspace-maps-prototype-json
key.description: Contains the information about the state and position of custom workspaces.

key.name: session-prototype-json
key.summary: JSObject containing all data for the sesion
key.description: Contains the information on the extensions session.
